input_text:
Job Title: Lead SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) Engineer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology, Quality Assurance

Description:
About AscendionAscendion is a full-service digital engineering solutions company. We make and manage software platforms and products that power growth and deliver captivating experiences to consumers and employees. Our engineering, cloud, data, experience design, and talent solution capabilities accelerate transformation and impact for enterprise clients. Headquartered in New Jersey, our workforce of 6,000+ Ascenders delivers solutions from around the globe. Ascendion is built differently to engineer the next.
Ascendion | Engineering to elevate life
We have a culture built on opportunity, inclusion, and a spirit of partnership. Come, change the world with us:Build the coolest tech for world’s leading brandsSolve complex problems – and learn new skillsExperience the power of transforming digital engineering for Fortune 500 clientsMaster your craft with leading training programs and hands-on experience
Experience a community of change makers!Join a culture of high-performing innovators with endless ideas and a passion for tech. Our culture is the fabric of our company, and it is what makes us unique and diverse. The way we share ideas, learning, experiences, successes, and joy allows everyone to be their best at Ascendion.  *** About the Role ***  Job Title: Lead SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) Engineer Key Responsibilities:Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using C# and RestSharp, HttpClient and Selenium to ensure the highest level of quality and reliability.Participates in the reviewing of engineering designs to contribute quality assurance requirements and considerations.Develop and enhance the automation framework to accommodate Azure Cloud base application testing.Establish and maintain best practices in QA automation and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
Minimum Qualifications:Minimum 2+ years of experience Leading / Mentoring a team members. Extensive development and testing experience, minimum of 8+ years of writing C# code and SQL experience are required.Advanced Automation experience using Visual Studio, C#, using RestSharp, HttpClient and SeleniumAdvanced knowledge and experience on REST APIs and web services and experience with Postman.Advanced knowledge of Azure ADO, JIRA and other test Management tools is required, knowing X-ray test management is a plus.Should have Data validation experience.Experienced with Grid or Docker servers/set up.Experienced working in an agile/scrum model, understanding and experience with SaFe method is a plus.Strong abilities for debugging and troubleshooting codes, Applications, or bugs.Strong capability to build platform performance and testing and analysis framework.Able to work with multiple teams, such as Development, DevOps, Release management to coordinate and sync and resolve any level issues for the system if any.
Desired Qualifications:Mortgage industry experience is nice to have. Empower LOS (Loan Origination System) experience a plus.
Location: This is 100% remote Role (Needs to work as per CST Time Zone) Salary Range: The salary for this position is between $70,000 – $120,000 annually. Factors which may affect pay within this range may include geography/market, skills, education, experience, and other qualifications of the successful candidate.
Benefits: The Company offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements: [medical insurance] [dental insurance] [vision insurance] [401(k) retirement plan] [long-term disability insurance] [short-term disability insurance] [5 personal days accrued each calendar year. The Paid time off benefits meet the paid sick and safe time laws that pertains to the City/ State] [10-15 days of paid vacation time] [6 paid holidays and 1 floating holiday per calendar year] [Ascendion Learning Management System] Want to change the world? Let us know.Tell us about your experiences, education, and ambitions. Bring your knowledge, unique viewpoint, and creativity to the table. Let’s talk!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
